Literature.Title: F365 has increased potency and efﬁcacy, decreased acute toxicity and nephrotoxicity, and higher unbound lung exposure. Carbapenem-resistant isolates
Literature.Author: Roberts KD, Zhu Y, Azad MAK, Han ML, Wang J, Wang L, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA025(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa FADDI-PA038(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB030(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii FADDI-AB034(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP032(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae FADDI-KP065(MIC=0.25µg/ml)
